onboarding.title: Let's Personalize Your Learning! (Amharic)
onboarding.description1: Tell us a bit about your background, current role, or area of expertise (e.g., "Software Developer", "Student in Finance", "Marketing Manager", "Curious about Web3") (Amharic).
onboarding.description2: This will help us tailor examples and explanations to what you already know, making complex topics easier to grasp (Amharic).
onboarding.textAreaPlaceholder: E.g., 'Frontend developer with 3 years experience', 'Marketing professional new to tech', 'Economics student' (Amharic)

errors.unknownAiError: An unknown error occurred with the AI service (Amharic).

initialPrompts.basics: I'm new to blockchain. Can you give me a simple introduction to Blockchain Basics to get me started? (Amharic)
initialPrompts.polkadot: I have some blockchain knowledge. Please provide an overview of Polkadot, focusing on its key features and architecture for advanced users. Try to use information from the Polkadot Wiki (Amharic).
